quote: You want to live but do you know how to live? You are scared of dying and tell me, is the kind of life you lead really any different from being dead? – Seneca
fact: The volume of the earth's moon is the same as the volume of the Pacific Ocean.
joke: Where do sheep go to get their hair cut? The baa-baa shop.
